long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install Projection's Chrome Extension in order to snip and save content. With this extension, you can crop out or 'snip' any section of any written content you are reading as well as any clip from any audio or video content you are consuming. This will then be saved to the Projection website. Enjoy snipping and saving!
